name: Phanpy
flavorText:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

previous.name: Kingdra
previous.flavorText:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.

next.name: Donphan
next.flavorText:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.
